title: Is stray kids worth stanning? How should I start stanning them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes they are definitely worth stanning! (Stanning autocorrected to stabbing lol) You should watch some introduction videos first to see who the members are and such. Then start moving on to the songs, they have so many amazing songs that it is super hard but I recommend starting from the beginning and making your way to the top. For me I was first introduced to them by watching a video called the Aussie line of stray kids where it introduced Felix (my bias ☺️) and Bang Chan (the leader of the group). In the video it showed Felix doing his rap of third eye and so I listened to the song itself and that was the first song I listened to by them. After you have introduced yourselves to them you should start watching funny and iconic videos you will not regret it! They are so hilarious they are such a funny group that I thought my friend group was weird but they are even more weird so it made it nice that they are a group that I can relate to. For Bang Chan if you are ever feeling lonely or sad he has your back you can go on YouTube and search Chan’s room episodes talking about mental health and such complications to show you all of the episodes where he talks about mental issues like depression, sadness, loneliness, anxiety, etc. Hope this helped in some way remember to love all of the members and don’t hate anyone because they are all so amazing! ~Atiana

Yes absolutely they’re like therapy in their songs. Listen to the older ones, but the ot8 versions, and probably don’t get involved in the woojin business because it’s a lot to take in. I’ve been with them for a while but it’s still hard to think about. but- learn the members and their voices first. Learn their faces. Watch hyunjin, felix, lee know’s dancing, felix’s deep voice, 3racha’s producing skills and older songs, changbin’s rap, seungmin, i.n, and han’s incredible vocals, chan’s leadership, and their duality. once you learn about the members, watch their music videos because they’re beautiful. I recommend levanter, back door, and get cool to show the discography. absolutely would recommend stray kids, they’re so supportive and welcoming. edit; i think you should also check out chris’s scandals and develope an opinion on them. Personally, i think it’s the past and he’s an incredible, smart, caring man who didn’t have much choice in the matter, but make your own opinions. have fun.
